snippet: The Polar Express didn't quite have the steam it needed to reach the North Pole. It couldn't even make it out of Rhode Island....

headline.print_headline: Polar Express Trip Cut Short After Train Breaks
headline.main: Polar Express Trip Cut Short After Train Breaks

lead_paragraph: The Polar Express didn't quite have the steam it needed to reach the North Pole. It couldn't even make it out of Rhode Island.
